short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that notifies you whenever any friend is added or removed from your friend list

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Want to know whenever someone adds or remove you as their friend on Roblox? This extension tracks up to 5 accounts at once and notifies you whenever your friends list has changed.
